string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications
string.context: Used as the name for a medication administration event on a patient's schedule

string.name: wp_happening_soon_section_name_yesterday
string.context: Used as a 'section' label for the portion patient's schedule that happened yesterday. Any translation over ~14 characters may be truncated

string.name: wp_happening_soon_section_name_earlier_today
string.context: Used as a 'section' label for the portion patient's schedule that happened earlier today. Any translation over ~14 characters may be truncated

string.name: wp_happening_soon_section_name_later_today
string.context: Used as a 'section' label for the portion patient's schedule that will still happen today. Any translation over ~14 characters may be truncated

string.name: wp_happening_soon_section_name_tomorrow
string.context: Used as a 'section' label for the portion patient's schedule that will happen tomorrow. Any translation over ~14 characters may be truncated

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_exact
string.context: Displays for an event that starts at an exact time and has no available end time. %1$@ is the time the event starts, like '10:00 a.m.'

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_nearby
string.context: Displays for an event that starts at an approximate time and has no available end time. %1$@ is the rough time the event starts, like '10 a.m.'

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_morning
string.context: Used to describe when an event occurred, if it occurred or will occur in the morning and we're only allowed to share the time of day

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_afternoon
string.context: Used to describe when an event occurred, if it occurred or will occur in the afternoon and we're only allowed to share the time of day

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_evening
string.context: Used to describe when an event occurred, if it occurred or will occur in the evening and we're only allowed to share the time of day

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_night
string.context: Used to describe when an event occurred, if it occurred or will occur at night and we're only allowed to share the time of day

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_yesterday
string.context: Used to describe when an event occurred, if it occurred yesterday and we're only allowed to share the day

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_today
string.context: Used to describe when an event occurred, if it occurred or will occur today and we're only allowed to share the day

string.name: wp_happening_soon_time_tomorrow
string.context: Used to describe when an event occurred, if it will occur tomorrow and we're only allowed to share the day

string.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_exact
string.context: Formats an event's start and end times when we want to show exactly when the event starts and ends. %1$@ is the event's exact start time, and %2$@ is the event's exact end time, both formatted like '10:15 AM'

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_nearby_hours
plurals.context: Formats an event's approximate start time and approximate duration, when the duration is expressed in hours. The plural key is the number of hours. %1$@ is the approximate start time (like '10 a.m.'), and %2$@ is the number of hours.
plurals.item: Starting around %1$@, for about an hour.
Starting around %1$@, for about %2$@ hours.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_nearby_minutes
plurals.context: Formats an event's approximate start time and approximate duration, when the duration is expressed in minutes. The plural key is the number of minutes. %1$@ is the approximate start time (like '10 a.m.'), and %2$@ is the number of minutes.
plurals.item: Starting around %1$@, for about a minute.
Starting around %1$@, for about %2$@ minutes.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_morning_hours
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place in the morning and the duration is expressed in hours. The plural key is the number of hours. %1$@ is the number of hours.
plurals.item: In the morning, for about an hour.
In the morning, for about %1$@ hours.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_afternoon_hours
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place in the afternoon and the duration is expressed in hours. The plural key is the number of hours. %1$@ is the number of hours.
plurals.item: In the afternoon, for about an hour.
In the afternoon, for about %1$@ hours.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_evening_hours
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place in the evening and the duration is expressed in hours. The plural key is the number of hours. %1$@ is the number of hours.
plurals.item: In the evening, for about an hour.
In the evening, for about %1$@ hours.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_night_hours
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place at night and the duration is expressed in hours. The plural key is the number of hours. %1$@ is the number of hours.
plurals.item: At night, for about an hour.
At night, for about %1$@ hours.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_morning_minutes
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place in the morning and the duration is expressed in minutes. The plural key is the number of minutes. %1$@ is the number of minutes.
plurals.item: In the morning, for about a minute.
In the morning, for about %1$@ minutes.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_afternoon_minutes
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place in the afternoon and the duration is expressed in minutes. The plural key is the number of minutes. %1$@ is the number of minutes.
plurals.item: In the afternoon, for about a minute.
In the afternoon, for about %1$@ minutes.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_evening_minutes
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place in the evening and the duration is expressed in minutes. The plural key is the number of minutes. %1$@ is the number of minutes.
plurals.item: In the evening, for about a minute.
In the evening, for about %1$@ minutes.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_timeofday_night_minutes
plurals.context: Formats an event's time of day and approximate duration, when the event takes place at night and the duration is expressed in minutes. The plural key is the number of minutes. %1$@ is the number of minutes.
plurals.item: At night, for about a minute.
At night, for about %1$@ minutes.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_durationonly_hours
plurals.context: Formats an event's approximate duration, when the duration is expressed in hours. The plural key is the number of hours. %1$@ is the number of hours.
plurals.item: About an hour.
About %1$@ hours.

plurals.name: wp_happening_soon_timespan_durationonly_minutes
plurals.context: Formats an event's approximate duration, when the duration is expressed in minutes. The plural key is the number of minutes. %1$@ is the number of minutes.
plurals.item: About a minute.
About %1$@ minutes.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_details_view_title
string.context: Title of the activity that displays when the user clicks on an event from the timeline.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_task_details_documented_by
string.context: Label for the provider who documented this task. %1$@ will be replaced with the provider's name

string.name: wp_happening_soon_task_details_completed
string.context: Status for a nursing task that has been completed. %1$@ is the time it was completed.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_task_details_skipped
string.context: Status for a nursing task that has been skipped.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_task_details_canceled
string.context: Status for a nursing task that has been canceled.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_task_details_frequency
string.context: Tells the user how often a task is repeated. %1$@ is the frequency (from the server), like 'once' or 'every 2 hours' or '4 times a day'. It works great in English as 'This Event occurs ___.', but you can switch it to 'Frequency: ___' in another language if the grammar doesn't work out.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_appointment_details_procedures
string.context: Displayed above a list of procedures that make up an inpatient appointment or surgery

string.name: wp_happening_soon_appointment_details_providers
string.context: Displayed above a list of providers who will be involved in an inpatient appointment or surgery

string.name: wp_happening_soon_appointment_details_instructions
string.context: Displayed above patient instructions for an inpatient appointment or surgery

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications_ordered_by
string.context: Label for the provider that ordered this medication. %1$@ will be replaced with the provider's name

string.name: wp_happening_soon_acc_medication_status
string.context: Accessibility label for the status of a medication. %1$@ will be replaced with the current status of a medication administration, like Due or Complete

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medication_status_set_by
string.context: Accessibility label for the provider who set the current status of a medication. %1$@ will be replaced with the provider's name

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medication_completed
string.context: Tells the user when a medication was given. %1$@ = the completing action. Could be 'given', 'new bag', 'restarted', etc. %2$@ = the time the med was given

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medication_completed_with_day
string.context: Tells the user when a medication was given, if it was given on a day that wasn't the day it was due. %1$@ = the completing action. Could be 'given', 'new bag', 'restarted', etc. %2$@ = the time the med was given. %3$@ = the day it was given. Could be 'today', 'tomorrow', '11/12/2018', etc.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medication_not_given_with_reason
string.context: Tells the user that a medication was not given. %1$@ = how the med was not given - 'Skipped', 'Held', etc. %2$@ = the reason the med was not given - 'Patient refused', 'Patient asleep', etc.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications_linked_and
string.context: Labels a group of linked medications using the 'and' linkage type - i.e., all of them will be given together

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications_linked_or
string.context: Labels a group of linked medications using the 'or' linkage type - i.e., only one of them will be given

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications_hidden_multi
string.context: Header that indicates that medications are hidden from only some proxies

resources.string: Drugs with this icon are hidden from some family and friends.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications_hidden_all
string.context: Header that indicates that medications are hidden from all proxies

resources.string: Drugs with this icon are hidden from family and friends.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications_hidden_header
string.context: Header for the list of proxies that the medications may be hidden from

string.name: wp_happening_soon_medications_hidden_accessibility_label
string.context: Appended to accessibility label for hidden medications

string.name: wp_happening_soon_empty_schedule
string.context: Displayed to the user when there's nothing to display on the patient's schedule

resources.string: There are currently no scheduled events to display.

string.name: wp_happening_soon_error_message
string.context: Displayed to the user when we fail at displaying the patient's schedule.

resources.string: An error occurred when loading the schedule.
